title: 2025 Coriell Bioinformatics Internship
text:
Welcome!
We’re excited to have you as an intern and we hope that you’ll learn a lot with us this summer. We’ll use this book as a way to teach some fundamental concepts before you start working on an interesting project.
We hope to cover:

Introduction to bioinformatics
The basics of programming in R
The basics of data visualization
The basics of statistical testing with simulations
High-dimensional data analysis
How to give great scientific presentations
